Reviews.Title: “Budget and basic, but comfy as you like!”
Reviews.Author: Hannah C
Reviews.Content: bright breezy double little cosy super comfy beds didnt manage breakfast blame comfy beds luckily selling freshly baked croissants literally road bargain prices didnt miss youre 30 nearest slightly dodgy friendly coffeeshop handy youve dumped bags hotel flight road 1min walk albert market buying souvenirs tat slightly cheaper prices charged centre dont comments location hotel city centre yes situated quiet seemingly safe street ideal retreat hub bub city centre perfect switch plus takes 2 minutes walk nearest tram stop 7 10 tram museum district past heineken experience leidesplein 10 minutes staff friendly helpful linen clean brought pillowcases wouldnt exactly soundproofed wasnt disturbed guests occasionally hear talking door walking upstairs brought ear plugs depends expect money pay beer money expect receive beer champagne beer fine definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “what you save (if) doesn't worth all those dislikes”
Reviews.Author: Hansvg
Reviews.Content: amsterdam lovely city terrible hotel recepcionist isnt nice easy breakfast piece bread cheese glass juice service mmm dont forgot fortunately stayed nights dog aisle totally dirty beds single size cant imaging bathroom awful time faucet engine pump starts knock wall machines brake streets internet paid signal weak location central station hot spots impressive speak money save doesnt worth dislikes

Reviews.Title: “Would def stay again”
Reviews.Author: eva15000
Reviews.Content: stayed twin friend absolutely satisfied location 20 mins walking distance tiny dont wanna stay amsterdam anyway bathrom tiny clean fresh towels everyday staff friendly helpful def stay hotel cheap location staff nice

Reviews.Title: “nicely surprised”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: value price ive read lot bad reviews definitely stay bad walk home town center day clean dust bed didnt notice day towels changed everyday satisfied

Reviews.Title: “More minimum than Max”
Reviews.Author: David W Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: reception staff welcoming helpful beds wardrobe shower toilet crammed space impossible sit toilet saddle noise guests combined witht uncomfortable beds meant poor nights sleep breakfast basic poor quality luncheon meat cheese egg sight advertised wifi didnt stood corridor originally booked 4 nights left

Reviews.Title: “The most disgusting room I've ever slept in”
Reviews.Author: Nelly B
Reviews.Content: avoid hotel costs horribly grimy dirty mold growing bedroom walls shower boyfriend woke chest infection staying damp musty door didnt lock properly hanging single hinge staff unfriendly breakfast inedible stay avoid garden literally shed horribly yard

Reviews.Title: “basic but clean”
Reviews.Author: sjwagdomEire
Reviews.Content: 15 20 mins walk centre establishment basic clean ok teenage travellers budget walls paper thin beds average 4 flights stairs sit loo sideways able close door etc youre looking cheap crash ok

Reviews.Title: “Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: justerino
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed august 2011 travelling europe hotel run updating stayed 2 nights called brothel painted red complete red carpet extremely sink near door seperate shower complete toilet inside shower shower curtain window properly constant smell thinking makes skin crawl hotel breakfast variety choose set day bread rolls slices ham cheese fruit cereal toast juice coffee tea hotel future

Reviews.Title: “Whatever you do, Dont stay here!”
Reviews.Author: ChrWal
Reviews.Content: booked night wish gone else garden basically dirty shed garden converted clean broken unuseable shower hanging wall toilet filthy wall thin coughing nice else

Reviews.Title: “You should avoid”
Reviews.Author: mariuszah
Reviews.Content: ive stayed max hotel 2009 searched hotel amsterdam cheap finally booked max try avoid booking hotel following reasons bed sheets dirty staff change sheets brought dirty stayed literally didnt space walk bed sitting stay bed bathroom dirty breakfast ive seen worse location decent safe hotel central didnt mind walk center

Reviews.Title: “WOULD NOT STAY HERE IF YOU PAID ME! WOULD RATHER SLEEP IN PARK!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jani_und_Jesse
Reviews.Content: begin worst hotel experience call hotel slum ghetto appropriate arrived late night door left greeted spiders hanging door light broken bathroom light mosquitos bugs smelt underground basement appeared water damage damp hair dust floor looked hadnt cleaned cobwebs beds bathroom looked cleaned shower scum walls edges black hair shower shower water pump sounded machine gun sheets stunk hadnt washed spent night sleeping bags trying touch fussy people hotel worst slept life leaving garden house broke foot falling broken decking outside talked receptionist didnt understand english wearing casual sports clothing wernt tired leaving amsterdam day left immediately 55 euros night shocking park cleaner nicer sleep advice spend 20 euros stay else enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, small hotel, wouldn't recommend”
Reviews.Author: plasticniki
Reviews.Content: partner stayed hotel august bank holiday weekend didnt expect considering price paid didnt expect greeted dirty arrival hairs floor beds shower hadnt cleaned properly dont bed linen fresh tv remote didnt annoyingly provided bathmat stayed garden due rain letting leaves water weve stayed wide variety accommodation â£20 pricer doubt worst stayed hand location okay bit walk center amsterdam albert cuyp market nice lot bars etc try amazing breakfast okay compared continental breakfasts ive subjected particular note provide proper orange juice watered stuff breakfast yourself waiting table wouldnt recommend hotel unless arent fussy boyfriend fussy stay clean

Reviews.Title: “The staff made our stay much better.”
Reviews.Author: leopaixao
Reviews.Content: reading reviews hotel actually stayed minuscule garden privet bathroom corridor hotel clean linens towels clean beds soft extremely low ceiling window actually half anne franks hidden weve seen museum staff extremely helpful friendly stay pleasant breakfast ok bread coffee milk orange juice cereal cheese ham location extraordinary quiete neighborhood close center walking distances touristic attraction amsterdam stand bit frustration hotel worth save bucks spend
